Articles.Content:
Nautilus maneuvers into position to take revenge on the offending Spirit of Bizmark.

The damage done last turn seems to be entirely superficial.

It turns out some of the missiles were damaged. Out of four shots, the first two hit, tearing off some missiles. The third was a miss, but the fourth was a kill.

Persistence:

http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=87054421533389223127

Hmm. Are we allowed to board enemy ships? Because Jeb is the captain of the Spirit of Bizmark, and I sense some badassery in the near future if so. Also, no your missiles weren't damaged, Daemon, one of mine got lodged n the middle and I decided to leave it in the hope it caused havoc.

Also, I have been working on a Prototype Destroyer that actually looks quite similar to the Drekevak. (pics soon)
The missiles did get damaged. Some of them lost some of their sepratrons, causing them to spiral out of control instead of into your ship.
Lol i hit 2400 posts! And nice, two battles at the same time! that's new!
It did happen once before.
Would have been 3 if corgi was on.

Unfortunately, due to my intense and fruitless concentration, I forgot to take pictures of my turn. I can however say that: JEEZUS THOSE THING ARE FREAKING INDESTRUCTIBLE! HOW! WHY! Daemon, I see how you have constructed those ships, and damn you for it, too. That armour setup has made any and all of my missiles completely useless. I'll keep fighting, but I'm damn sure I've lost this before it even began.

Persist: http://www./download/izyw65h2eog1aei/persistent.sfs

Do you have any idea how difficult it is to pilot a squid with only one engine?

Tethys, damaged somewhat from the previous turn, and with only a single engine (and about ten reaction wheels) takes aim at The Second Zero.

Tethys fires once, causing no damage, but making a flashy explosion...

A second shot, however, shatters The Second Zero into itty bitty bits.

Lucky timing, too, as the lack of fine control left the Tethys drifting slowly toward its target. It would have eventually collided had it not destroyed its target first.

A shame, too. That was a really nice looking ship.

Persistence:

http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=15891499658242180995

Actually, I deployed two "Icaruga MK II"s, the other being "The Sword of Toudo", so there is still that and a two "Buarai"s to deal with. On my end however, those squids are proving quite mighty, so I have reverse engineered a "composite" armour based on what I found after damaging the "Tethys", and implemented it on my new un-named prototype.

Finally the Archangel gets a chance (points to spartwo and daemon)

LOL 151.5m Dang that is close. Here i am hitting you from 20km and your sitting on my back with a 45 and give it to me point blank.

One to the brain pan, Squish!

if you can tell me what that quote is from I'll be your friend.

Honestly i thought that that ship class was my smallest i'm sry I don't even know my own ships.

And Damion made ablative armor that is designed to break off of the harder stuff under it an take all the orce.

Edited November 2, 2013 by camulus777

AGAIN. WHAT THE ****. what are those made of!? freakin Diamond Nanotubes or something,Kod DAMMIT. N matter what I do I just cant bust through that second hull. And Im not a good enough shot to hit the edges of the command pod that stick out from the armour. I did knock off some seperatrons though, so at least a couple of your missiles are broken.

Aaanyways, Yada-yada-yada, fired all of the Sword of Toudo's missiles (Literally, EVERY SINGLE ONE) and I only did damage to the cosmetics and one or two of the missiles. SoT retreated to higher orbit after expending all of it's ammunition, and it can't ram, so I guess that means that it's out of the fight.

Persist: http://www./download/izyw65h2eog1aei/persistent.sfs

The only good image I actually managed to get. And even then it sucked (all of the rest were in the dark, and I couldn't wait until morning as they were drifting apart) :
WHAT DID I MISS TODAY?!?! so everything else is caps

non relavent/badly made

Edited November 2, 2013 by briansun1

AGAIN. WHAT THE ****. what are those made of!? freakin Diamond Nanotubes or something,Kod DAMMIT. N matter what I do I just cant bust through that second hull. And Im not a good enough shot to hit the edges of the command pod that stick out from the armour. I did knock off some seperatrons though, so at least a couple of your missiles are broken.

Indeed, tough little buggers, these are the results of separate 4 torp volleys at close range:

Same shot on a drek:

I was surprised at how little damage it took, being so light and reinforced you just smack the whole thing about the place, hitting the central box is like trying to sink a cork with a sledge hammer (volley of 2 from ~400m):

Great design, agile and tough. Kudos to daemon for this one. I think I have a new Subject A. Also, I'm off to build my own indestructible nugget (Unless you will allow me to make the Nautilus Dark Star Edition?)
Yay no one notices me again.

This is the HTTT XX-4X or XX-4X Heavy tanker tug thing

it is the militarized versioncraft file

so what do you guys think?
Its big...
@Deathsoul: if you can hit from greater range. I've found at ranges of 1800-2500m it becomes easy to vaporize everything inside the enemy ship when it's hit.

Its big...

and has 27 SRB misslies
IDK what those are but nice.
there the "standered" missle that every "big" ship has.... (also on the bomber 3x and morningstar)

Morning corgi:)

I would love to see what my ships could do from outside point blank.
Hello. I have nothing to do since my tf2 is downloading for 3 hours
so um if you wish to try out the tanker/missle boat could you also tell me if there's anything wrong with it?(you can also just take the misslies off and turn it into a base thing)
I need something to blow up with your tanker.
